description:
Renny Epstain is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] and the Chief of the http://anidb.net/ch32501 [North American Branch].
After the relocation of the http://anidb.net/ch32499 [Headquarters], Renny appears before Bak to deliver the news to http://anidb.net/ch83366 [Komui Lee] about a new type of Exorcist: members of http://anidb.net/ch84585 [CROW] that have been implanted with the Akuma cells of http://anidb.net/ch81263 [Alma Karma]. While talking to Komui, she explains that the half-Akuma are Third Exorcists and have stationed five of them of them at the Black Order, by the orders of the http://anidb.net/ch32502 [Central].
Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.
name: Renny Epstein
